# mayStore

**Type Property**

An object that indicates your app may store a data element for an indefinite length of time.

## Declaration

```swift
class var mayStore: PKIdentityIntentToStore { get }
```

## Getting default intents

- **willNotStore**: An object that indicates your app won’t store a data element any longer than necessary to complete a request.

items.description: An object that indicates your app won’t store a data element any longer than necessary to complete a request.
